Gina was at her uncle's house out of state. Her parents were in the living room playing music. In the kitchen there was a beer can on the counter. She thought about taking a sip. She decided it would be wrong to drink it.

Colin started fifth grade at a new school. He was very shy. He thought no one would befriend him due to his shyness. But Colin's classmates were encouraging and kind. All the kids at Colin's school hated him.
Amy was 14 Year's old. She was starting to feel like an adult. She explained this to her friend Lynn, as Lynn sat on a swing. Lynn didn't care. Lynn continued to swing.

Michelle really wanted a new computer, but didn't have enough money. She worked really hard to try to make enough. She worked hours and hours, but bills kept showing up. She finally decided that maybe she didn't need a new one. Michelle did not like computers.

School was just a disaster today. It was raining and everyone got soaked in the rain. There was also a fire and everyone had to evacuate the school. I caught a fever from being in the rain for several minutes. I went swimming in the lake.

Rocket was the nickname of Jose. He was nicknamed that because of his speed. One day he was running track at school tournament. He won first place as the fastest kid in school. Jose was embarrassed that he had lost.

Sherry liked to explore the outdoors. She decided to hike in the state park on a sunny day. While walking along a creek she saw something shiny. Bending down, she picked up the shiny item. She picked up a knife covered with rust.
Charles had a big, white dog. He did not like the way the dog looked. Charles thought about what he could do to change it. He painted the dog pink. He was very full.

Gina had searched for her lost pencils for days. She had even searched the bag of a boy she thought took them. She knew she couldn't ask her mother for more pencils. And she didn't have money to buy more. Luckily, Gina's teacher handed out new pencils that day.

My friend visited me from California. We went to his van, smoked and talked. Time went by fast as we caught up. My friend told me that he had to go. My friend left and I was happy about the experience.

Laverne needs to prepare something for her friend's party. She decides to bake a batch of brownies. She chooses a recipe and follows it closely. Laverne tests one of the brownies to make sure it is delicious. The brownies are so delicious Laverne eats two of them.

Kelly was rushing to get to her flight on time. Unfortunately security was taking forever. By the time she left securit she checked the time. It was six and her flight left a half hour ago. Kelly boarded the plane.

It is usually calm and warm in the morning, in Florida. Yesterday morning it was very windy, though. The palm tree fronds were blowing so hard they scraped the windows. I turned on the TV and a tornado warning came on! So I went outside to play.

The soccer game was tied 3 to 3 and there was a minute left to play. Julie had never scored a goal yet, but knew today would be her day. Ashley passed her the ball and this was chance. She kicked as hard as she could, and the ball soared into the net. Julie's teammates said she let down the team.
Joe was walking home one night. Out of nowhere, a man approached and stabbed him. Joe was badly injured! He staggered to the nearest hospital. He went straight to the cafeteria and had a long dinner.

Terry loves to swim but he never learned how to dive. He always jumps in the water feet first. This summer Terry decides he wants to learn how to dive in the water. He practices diving very hard every day. Terry has given up swimming.

My niece just got engaged. She is Chinese and her fiance is Caucasian. Her parents had them over for a home cooked meal. The fiance got nausea from the unfamiliar dishes and had to leave. My niece was very upset that her fiance was sick.

Florence loves the way that her friends look in summer dresses. She decides that she wants to have one too. She visits her local mall and finds a beautiful dress with flowers. Florence tries it on and it fits perfectly. She smeared dirt all over the dress.
My wife always packs more than she needs. She carries a lot of heavy luggage. I usually have to help her as well. It's hard to carry. We manage.
Mary ate pudding every day. She ate it for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. One day she ran out of pudding. She then decided to become a chef. Mary never made pudding as a chef.

Harold wanted to see his favorite band in concert. When they finally came to town, he bought a ticket. He entered the concert hall and found a good place to stand. The band played for three hours. Harold's feet hurt after the concert.

A family was driving home from vacation in Florida. They noticed a space museum and decided to stop. They went inside and checked out all of the exhibits. After that, they watched a movie about space. The family felt they had wasted their time.
Ivy had been asked on an unconventional date. Her crush Peter had asked her to go hiking! Ivy agreed. They went to the woods and hiked for hours. Afterwards they watched the sunset from a cliff.
John was a terrible boss. The workers decided to depose him. So they filed a complaint. Despite the complaint and following lawsuit John stayed. John decided to be a better boss.

Laura told Cindy she would bake her a cake for her birthday. Laura decided to make a chocolate cake. She found a recipe online. She worked all day baking the cake. Laura sold the cake so she could afford new shoes.

Manny wanted to get better at making Italian food. He learned how to make noodles from scratch. He learned how to make different sauces. He put on a big Italian dinner for his family. He paid the chef $500 to prepare the meal.
Marie's husband is in the Army. He is away for a tour overseas. Marie walked into her home. Her husband was waiting on the couch. Marie was shocked.

Ned wants a hobby that will get him outside. He decides to plant a vegetable garden in his yard. Ned plants tomato, eggplant, and pepper in his garden. He is surprised by how much work it takes. Ned is proud of his hard work and tasty vegetables.
It was a cold winter night. The roads were slippery. Jim was driving home from work. He lost control of his truck. Jim was happy.

Shy Anna was not very popular in high school. People thought she was too boring. Little did they know, by night she was a guitarist in a local band. Soon her band was garnering national attention. That was why no one liked her.
Bob wanted a hamburger. But he also wanted to eat healthier. So he decided to make a veggie burger. Bob thought it wasn't as good as a normal burger. Bob went out to McDonald's later that evening.

Kathy desired to be a Physical Therapist since she was in high school. In college, she took many classes and applied for graduate school. After a period of waiting, she finally received her acceptance email! She made her way through schooling and graduated with her degree. Kathy decided to become a sushi chef.

Rachel loved to play on her piano. One day she was paid to play at a romantic event. She lit candles and put them on her piano. The candles started to burn low. She caught them before they burned her piano.
Gina was searching for her phone in her dad's car. She was sure it would be there. But after checking everywhere she couldn't see it. She ran in the house and grabbed a flashlight. Gina went to bed.

Kara lost her dog yesterday. She freaked out. Frantic, Kara looked all over town for it. Finally she found the dog in her neighbor's yard. Kara asked the neighbors not to put out dog treats in their yard.
Bethany was self-conscious about her arm hair. She tried shaving it off. It grew back within a few weeks. She got a laser hair removal treatment. She felt better about herself.

Joyce was adopted by her foster mother when she was 5 Year's old. After her adoption her mom adopted 3 more children. Joyce loved being an older sister and she helped her mom a lot. When she moved out on her own she became a foster parent too. Joyce abandoned her kids shortly after.

Joe needed to get a portrait of himself for a project. He called up some local artists and asked their rates. One of the artists had reasonable rates. Joe made an appointment with that artist to do the portrait. The artist painted a Joe's cat.

Polly planted crocus bulbs with her grandmother. Grandma told her that they would bloom in early spring. There was a late snow that year. But the crocus were not to be deterred. Polly's plants never bloomed.

George was in a bit of a pickle. He had a deadline that was rapidly approaching. He only had a few more pages to go in his book. He sat down at the computer and was struck with inspiration. George finished his manuscript and celebrated.

Ray looked at his monthly power bill with anger. He went around his house and began to shut off extra lights. On his second trip around the house he unplugged extra electronics. Ray say in the darkness with satisfaction. He loved watching television.

Darren struggled with depression. He never could shake the dark feelings he had. Finally he saw a specialist and got the help he needed. He learned that there were physiological reasons for his depression. Darren felt the appointment had been a waste of time.
David was an all around great football player. He was nervous about his next game. A scout would be there. This game would determine his future. David hoped to play really well.

Jon and Mika wanted a baby daughter. After years of trying, they finally conceived a baby girl. Unfortunately, the baby had complications. Jon and Mika were scared that the baby would die. Jon and Mika then gave birth to a boy.

I recently got a promotion at work. I have been with the company for nearly eight years. I have worked very hard to earn this promotion. I was so happy when my boss offered me the new position! I feel I don't deserve it.

John was really bored at work one day. He decided to order a huge amount of marshmallows from online. He also bought a marshmallow gun. He spent hours shooting marshmallows at the birds outside his house. John collected the marshmallows to eat afterwards.
Jim was summoned for jury duty. He had to call in to skip work. He arrived at the courtroom. He sat through the entire trial. Jim was extremely bored.
Tim wanted to travel overseas. He had never been on an airplane before. He decided to travel to China by air. He actually enjoyed the flight! Tim vowed never to get on another plane again.
I wanted to do something fun. I found an interesting movie online. I saw that it was playing in a local theatre. I decided to go see it. I drove past the theater and went back home.

Petey held the high score in the pizza parlor's arcade cabinet. It was a campaign fighting game from the 80s. One day Petey went in and the machine was gone. The staff informed him that it had broken down. Petey was very happy that the game was gone.

I got a cell phone case yesterday from the same place I got my phone. I dropped my phone two days later when I was walking down the street. Both the new case and my phone broke! I went back to the store to tell them the case doesn't work well. I comforted by cat after I stepped on her tail.

Jane was going to a Halloween party. She decided to go as a witch. She drove to work in the rain. She she stepped out of the car, she was splashed by another car. Being splashed, put Jane in a great mood.
I noticed my hair was getting too long. I tried to cut it myself, but failed. I put on my shoes and grabbed my keys. I went to the barber for a haircut. He told me to cut it myself.

I was stuck in traffic and very hungry. I knew I wouldn't make it home in time, and needed food. I decided to get fast food, but didn't know where from. I finally decided on subway, and parked my car. I threw away my sandwich.

Beth asked Amy to skip 4th period and go to McDonalds for lunch. Amy was hesitant but agreed to go. While at McDonald's Amy's band teacher walked in. He took the girls to the principal's office. They were suspended for a day.

Mike had a beautiful girlfriend. One day he was walking around his school yard. He saw his girlfriend with another guy. The other guy was his friend bob. Mike was sad to see his girlfriend with someone else.

In college, I had some terrible professors. They did not know how to teach the students. So, I learned to teach myself on my own. Instead of going to class, I went to the library and did exactly that. I loved all of my professors.

Year's ago I decided to start buying Investment Bonds. I completed the forms necessary for payroll withholdings. The deductions started immediately. In 2008 the economy went bust which caused the bonds to lose value. I made a lot of money.

The game was tied. The last point made would determine the winner of the match. Eric served the tennis ball to Bill. Bill almost missed the ball, but he managed to hit it. Eric hit the ball with his baseball bat.

A little chipmunk made it's home in Ed's backyard. For weeks he tried to feed it a peanut out of his hand. It got a little closer every day. Finally, the chipmunk took it. The chipmunk was so terrified it bit Ed's hand.

Beth was recovering from an illness. She was finally able to eat food after 4 days. Although she was better she wasn't well. She decided to take Friday off from school and take time to heal. Beth needed to rest.

Sue was nervous about taking the driver's test. But she had been practicing a lot so she felt confident in her skills. She arrived at the DMV and the driving instructor greeted her. The test was going well, until Sue's car started to overheat. The DMV hired her on the spot.

When Emily was young she got to go to her first concert. She was nervous because of all of the people at the concert. Emily was very excited to see her favorite artist on the stage. The concert ticket was a gift for Emily for her birthday. This was the best birthday gift Emily had ever had.
Tray wanted candy. He could not reach the bowl. That did not stop him. He got a stool. He reached for the bowl and enjoyed the candy.

Tim wanted to connect more with nature. So, he went out in the woods. He heard the birds sing, the wind blow and the crickets creak. He loved it so much, he built a large tree house and moved in. He tore it apart.

Ben woke up late. Ben decided to skip breakfast and went to work. Work was too busy to take a break or eat lunch. After work, Ben was caught in real bad traffic. Ben was so hungry that he became sick.

Jim found an old disposable camera in the bottom of his junk drawer. He began snapping away at everything around him. The counter clicked down to one final photo. The gravity of the situation began to dawn on Jim. Jim took 20 more photos.
Sue got a white bunny for Easter. She named him Fred. About two weeks after she got him, Sue got a big surprise. There were five baby bunnies in the hutch with Fred. Fred was a male rabbit.

Nancy took her son to see some of her friends. Her friends decided to smoke and offered a cigarette. Although she had a baby on her, she decided to smoke. Her son ending up crying from the smoke. Nancy was a responsible parent.
Ace was playing poker with friends. At first he was having fun. Then he noticed something odd. One of his friends was sneakily cheating! Ace was happy for his friend.

Albert wanted to try out for the basketball team at school. He waited on the bench for his turn to play. He played his best as the coach watched and took notes. When he finished the coach told him he made the team. Albert was so disappointed.

Sally loved horses. She always wanted one of her own. Her parents said she would get one if she did well in school. Sally studied extra hard and made all As. Sally decided to get a cow instead of a horse.

At the time it seemed like a good idea. The bus driver parked and went into a bathroom at a gas station. Andre jumped in the driver's seat and drove off. He drove to three stops and picked up passengers. Andre could not drive.

Susan was five Year's old when she got her first puppy. She named the puppy Sammy. Sammy was a black Poodle. Susan mom bought her another puppy so Sammy would have a playmate. Sammy got along really well with the new puppy.

Arthur fell asleep while smoking one night. The cigarette but was still lit and fell on the floor. It rolled to the curtains and caught them on fire. Eventually his whole house burned down. Arthur died in the fire.

Larry was excited to eat steak for dinner. He made a reservation for 7. He eagerly waited all day for the time to arrive. When he got there, the waiter told him they were out of steak. He had to have grilled chicken instead.

Ed pass a car as he drove to the bank. He tried slowing down after passing but failed. His brakes did no work. Ed looked around for something to slow him down. Ed coasted to the side of the road until he stopped.

Lou needed some money for a video game. He put fliers in his neighbor's mailboxes offering to mow their lawns. He had six jobs lined up in just a few hours. He did so well he kept his business going. Lou now has the entire neighborhood as his customers.

Bill was working all day at the office. It was so busy, they made Bill skip lunch. After Bill's work day ended, he looked for a place to eat. He found a Red Robin right around the corner. But looking at it made Bill lose his appetite.

Amy saw shoes online she wanted. She went to the local mall but they didn't have them in her size. She went to another mall to find them. They also didn't have them. She then found them online and ordered them.

Every year the smiths go on a camping trip. This year they decided to go to Colorado to camp. The family took the trailer and the goods to go. The kids were excited. They decided to cancel the vacation.
Joey was camping with his friends. He wanted to start a fire to roast marshmallows. He found some sticks and logs in the woods. He used a match to light the logs. Then he roasted marshmallows.

Tom wanted to build a boat. He went to the store to buy the wood. Tom couldn't afford all of the supplies. His father helped Tom buy the other supplies. Tom never got the supplies he needed to build the boat.

Jason's best friend is getting married in India next year. Jason decides that he wants to learn Hindi before the wedding. He hires a tutor and practices speaking Hindi every day. When the wedding day arrives, Jason is fluent in Hindi! Jason's best friend was not impressed.

Collin likes to dress up. One Halloween he decided to wear his costume to the office. Collin's boss did not permit costumes to be worn in the workplace. He received a write-up. Collin received a raise and a promotion.

One weekend we wanted to see a movie with the kids. There were two movies they wanted to see. So we decided to divide and conquer. Two kids and myself went to one and my husband and our son another. Both groups had a great time seeing the movies they wanted.

Ben was babysitting. He had never babysat before and he was nervous. He found that the little boy was fun to watch, though. Soon he and the kid were laughing and playing games. He ended up babysitting to pay for college.

Mark took a sick day today, he was faking it, obviously. He didn't put on anything besides socks and boxers. He was eat ice cream and sing into his brush. The first verse of his encore he slipped on the hardwood floor. Mark enjoyed the trip.

Daddy took us to the woods to camp. He taught us how to build a fire with sticks. He helped us learn how to make our own tents. We fell asleep counting the stars in the sky. We had a wonderful time camping.

Jake had recently gotten a new cell phone. The very first thing he tried to do was take a selfie. He dropped his phone on the pavement while trying to do so. His phone was scuffed up on the back side. Jake returned to the  store  for a plastic cover for the phone.
Today I wrote a lot of stories. I sat down and thought about each one. Then, I typed it carefully into the boxes. Finally, I submitted the stories. I hoped my computer would erase my stories.

While doing dishes I grabbed two tea cups with one hand. They banged together and chipped one. I picked up the chip and set it aside. The next day I glued it back together. I threw the cups in the garbage.

Cindy felt like eating French toast for breakfast. She couldn't wait to cook it. After she finished, she happily started eating. But she began to feel sick and tired. Cindy went to her bedroom and laid down.

Janice notices that she is very tired after work. Her coworker suggests that they stop at a bar for a glass of wine. Janice and her coworker have a glass of pinot noir and relax. Janice feels much better on her walk home. Janice relaxes at home and falls asleep.
John had been looking at houses. He had not found one he was in love with. He finally found one in his price range. He put in an offer. The seller accepted and John was the proud owner of a new home!
Amy was moving out of town. The best part was quitting her horrible job. She walked into her boss's office with her head high. She firmly told him she was quitting. She cried after losing her job.

Jane wanted to learn how to juggle. Jane consulted with a professional juggler to teach her. Jane went to three classes with the professional juggler. After three weeks, Jane was juggling. Jane had a natural talent.

Kevin was getting ready to leave for school in the morning. But he couldn't find his sneaker anywhere! He looked everywhere with no luck at all. Then he decided his dog had probably hidden the sneaker. He found his cat, but the cat didn't have the shoe.

Donna quit her job today. She realized that her husband makes enough for both of them. She asked her husband if he was okay with her decision. He was and supported her with whatever she decides to do. Donna couldn't believe how selfish her husband was.
David's parents got him a bike. He didn't want one. But he didn't want his gift to go to waste. After learning how to ride the bike, he was glad he had one. David rode his bike every day.
Frankie was in love with a distant, aloof man. The man she loved was not very nice to her. He cheated on her with other people in town. Frankie left him. Frankie went to see a movie.

Burke doesn't have many friends. He always walks around with a scowl on his face. One day, a stranger tells him that he should smile more. Burke decides to try smiling. Burke loves interference from strangers.

Dave decided one day he wanted to go see a nickelback show. He ordered a few tickets. He then invited some of his friends. They all went to the show, and had a good time Dave checks the internet for more concerts the he will like.

Chad was an incredible singer. He was just too afraid to sing. He wanted to join a church choir but thought his friends would laugh. Due to him being so embarrassed by his skill and passion. Chad got up the nerve to deliver his comedy routine.

An oompah band and a mariachi band met on the street. They decided to have an impromptu jam session. They soon discovered that their styles were incompatible. Nearby residents called the police to complain about the noise. The police told them to keep playing.

I was looking on craigslist and saw a free piano. The person needed to get rid of it and I called him. I got his address and showed up at his house. When I got there I saw the nice piano. I then sold the man my piano.
Every morning, a bird woke Fred up for work at 6 AM. Fred began to like the bird. And he enjoyed the sound of its singing. One day, the bird no longer sang. He was happy because he hated the bird.

Growing up, Matt was never the most confident guy. He always had a big crush on his neighbor Lexy, but was scared. However, when prom was approaching, he decided to finally make a move. Matt asked Lexi to be his date, and she immediately said yes. Matt was miserable at the turn of events.

Joline went to the nail salon to get a manicure. The nail technician cleaned and trimmed her nails. Joline could not decide what color nail polish she would like. The nail technician suggested a design that used multiple colors. She let the technician change her oil.

Two countries were competing for resources and global recognition. The two countries disagreed on some fundamental issues. One country declared war on the other and invaded. The two countries fought for many Year's. The second country joined the first country against a third.

Ben decided to treat himself to a coffee. He paid for the coffee using his debit card. Later, the bank called him saying he over-drafted. They explained that he had to pay a thirty dollar charge. Ben was frustrated at the extra charge.

Ken met a nice man online, and they decided to go on a date. They met at a nice restaurant and shook hands. Ken and his date ordered food and had small talk. While they ate, Ken decided that he really liked the man. Ken made an excuse to leave quickly.

Lauren was nervous about giving a speech for her French final exam. She arrived to class. It was her turn to give her speech. She finished her speech and felt relieved. Lauren was excited about going out to lunch soon.

A little boy was in the third grade. He was very smart but struggled with reading. Whenever he read out loud his classmates laughed at him. He started to practice reading every single day. At the end of the year, he did well on his reading test.

Alex ran across town to get to a friends house. He didn't know his shoe was untied. He had ran for three block when it happened. He tripped on that shoelace of his. Alex resolved to always check his shoelaces before leaving.
Donald was a big Colts fan. He followed the team religiously. His family wanted to surprise him for his birthday. They bought him front row Cots tickets. Donald was disappointed.

Sarah was out with her friends. She had been watching a movie at the theater. Sarah lost track of time and arrived back at home late. She missed her curfew by a few hours. Sarah's parents were waiting for her with flowers and candy.

My dog waited for me by the house front door. We walked to the park for playtime and exercise. The dog and I walked around the block before returning home. When we walked through the front door, she took a big drink of water. Then she lay down and took a nap.

Chuck stepped the cabin cruiser and onto the dock. The boat was new as was his knot tying skills. He quickly tied off the boat. The line was long for the restaurant but he eventually got a table. Chuck then ordered food and was happy with the service.

There were six puppies running around my foyer. It was going to be hard to choose the one we wanted to buy. Each of my daughters picked out a different pup. The owner said we could get a discount on two dogs. We did not like the dogs.

Haley was a young scientist at a famous laboratory. Every day, she worked hard on her current project. One of her colleagues was secretly stealing her research. Haley discovered this when he published it in a scientific journal. Haley felt like she had been betrayed.

Billy loved playing video games. One day he begged his parents to take him to Kmart. He saw a whole bunch of games there. He picked out a popular shooter game then took it home. Billy decided that he was sick of video games.

My friend went out one night looking to find love. He ended up getting pretty drunk. The next thing we knew he was flirting with a gay man. After a while, we lost track of our friend. Our friend ended up home at three am with a girl.

Rob was in charge of all the people at work. Rob though everybody liked him. One day Rob heard his employees saying mean things about him. Rob's feelings were hurt. Rob was glad his employees thought so highly of him.
A friend came to visit. I told her that my dog bites. She did not listen. she tried to pet him and play with him. My dog ran away.

Tom didn't know why his internet speed was so slow. He called his cable company but there were no problems. He finally decided to buy a new router. That made a huge difference. Tom was glad his cable picture had improved.

Lance wanted to have a romantic evening with his wife. He put the kids to bed early and started dinner. He forgot to check the cooking and burned down the kitchen. His wife arrived to the fire department. Lance's wife felt very romantic and loving when she arrived home.

Anna has lost twenty pound in three months. Her friends aren't sure what her secret is. Last week they decided to ask her. She said she was working out and eating better. Anna's friends were surprised by her simple methods.

Ava needed a plane ticket across the country. She feared it'd be expensive. Then the agent told her something wonderful. She had earned enough miles to pay for her ticket! Ava was able to fly without spending any money on her ticket.

Maggie and her classmates went to a zoo for their field trip. They saw monkeys, gorillas and panda's first. After that, they saw snakes and lizards! They even got to feed some of the baby animals. Maggie loved her trip to the zoo.
Kelly was taking her daughter to get her first shot. Her daughter got scared and started crying. Kelly tried to soothe her. The shot was painful. Kelly's daughter started laughing.

Matt's children's room was now too small for all three children. Matt couldn't afford to move to another house. Matt talked with his wife about their options. They both agreed it best to switch the children into the master suite. Matt would move the children into the master suite.

I wrote a prompt and posted it online. Readers of my prompt wanted more. I wrote a short story that expanded on the prompt. My prompt readers grew and they wanted even more. I decided to start a blog.

I love to play baseball but I hate watching baseball. It's fun to play but honestly it's so boring to watch. My dad loves to watch it and I sometimes sit with him and watch. We talk about the old days when we used to play together outside. I wish he would pass away already.

One day, John met a cute girl named Jessica. He enjoyed talking to her and spending time with her. John asked Jessica to go out with him on a date. She said yes, and they had a good time. John was glad he asked her on a date.

Carl joined the military right after high school. He signed a short contract that put him on the front lines. His best friend was killed in front of him. Happiness became a foreign concept to Carl. Carl had to go to therapy for post-traumatic stress disorder.

My friend  Cam was an Amazon bookseller. He had 4,000 books stored in a garage. He made enough money to live simply. His house caught on fire one day and he lost his collection. Cam has since decided to insure his belongings.

One day, John met a cute girl named Jessica. He enjoyed talking to her and spending time with her. John asked Jessica to go out with him on a date. She said yes, and they had a good time. John was upset that they had such an awful time.

I had been giving this homeless man change everyday. He was on the same corner near my house. One day, as I was driving through my neighborhood I saw a new car. Soon enough, I saw the same homeless man emerge from it! I never gave the man money again.
Gina and her friends were outside of the school library. They wanted to go inside. But the librarian was not in in the library. The girls weren't sure where she could be. Gina hated the library.

On Sunday, Tori found out she was pregnant! She immediately called her husband to share the good news. Tori's husband was just as excited. The two discussed baby names for nearly half an hour. Tori had to go to therapy because she was so upset.

Mary wanted to dress up as an angel. So she got the wings and the pink outfit. And she even wrote what she was trying to be so no one would wonder. But some of her friends as school started laughing. Mary felt very appreciated.

Jeb liked peppermint candy. He always had peppermints in his pocket. One day, he saw a pretty girl buying peppermints in the store. He decided it was a sign and boldly asked her out on the spot. Jeb finally got a date after months of looking.

I was really nervous before my first middle school dance. I was surprised my crush said yes to begin with. When we finally got the chance to dance I stepped on her foot. It wound up broken. Now, she won't even talk to me.

Jen's manager told her she needed to upload her resume. She realized her resume was not formatted properly. She transferred all of the content over to the proper template. Adding information on her latest job, she updated the resume. Jen hated washing dishes.

Dan and Carol met as manager trainees at a fast food restaurant. They were sent to further training in a town three hours away. They decided to drive together to save on costs. Talking in the car for hours each way, they got to know each other. By the time they got to the training, they felt like friends.
Oliva wanted to go shopping. She decided to go to the mall. She found a great sale on shoes. She bought three pairs. Olivia decided to never go shopping again.

A man named Nick was walking down the street. He noticed a small leather wallet in the grass. He picked it up and it was filled with cash. Nick decided to give the wallet to the police station. The police never found the owner so they gave it to Nick.

Joanie was interviewing for her first job. She was very nervous. She really wanted to get the position at the ice cream shop. She thought the interview went pretty well. The next day she got a call and was offered the job.

Mike is a cop who got shot in the leg. He had never gotten shot before, it made him think about life. He didn't know if he would go back to work. He saw the crime on the news that night. Mike laughed hysterically.

Yesterday I played the Powerball game. I picked my numbers from our family's bible. I purchased my tickets from a reputable online lottery agent. I prayed nervously as the winning numbers were drawn. I didn't win.
Joe and his friends had their soccer game today. Joe was nervous. He was nervous if he would win or not. Finally after the game, Joe's team won. Joe was very disappointed in his team.

Adam was rushing a fraternity. They dared him to pick a coconut from a palm tree. He went out at night and scaled a palm. Then he cut down a large coconut and returned with it. The frat was proud of him.

A young toddler was climbing up a chair in his living room. As he climbed, his foot slipped and he fell to the ground. The boy started crying very loudly. His mother heard him from in the kitchen and ran over to him. The mother comforted the child.

The Epps go to the ocean for vacation every year. This time they would participate in a sand castle contest. Each family member worked on a different part. The littlest Epps filled the moat with ocean water. The finished the castle in two hours.

I asked my girlfriend to prom in a very creative way. She said yes! I got a tuxedo and she got a beautiful dress. At prom, we were named prom king and prom queen! It was a spectacular and memorable night.

Paul had to write a research paper for school on Monday. Paul sat around all weekend and forgot about his paper. He finally remembered his paper on Sunday night before bed. Paul sat up all night typing his research paper! Paul promised to stop procrastinating.

I was going for a ride with my grandparents. I had fallen asleep in the backseat. A fox darted across the road. My grandfather slammed on the brakes. We stopped in time to see the fox run across the road.

Amy's family was going to Six Flags. She sat patiently in the car waiting to arrive. When the arrived she sat on her knees surveying the park. She waited in line for an hour to ride the largest roller coaster. Amy was really excited to be at the park.

Darla was afraid of spiders. One day, as she was cleaning her room, she saw one on the wall. She screamed and jumped away. She yelled for her father to come in and help. Darla decided to make the spider a pet.

Cindy was reading a story about a dog. But she never liked dogs. As she kept reading, however, she became attached to the dog. In the end of the story, the dog died. Cindy cried at the end of the story.

Francis had always wanted to become a history teacher. He studied history very diligently in college. Finally he applied for a job teaching history at a middle school. He worked hard to be the best teacher he could be. He won an award for best teacher his very first year.

Charlotte was about to board a plane to the United States. She was about to embark on 10 month journey as an exchange student. She had promised her mom not to fall in love with an American. But when she met Shane it was love at first sight. She worried that her mother would be upset.

Jerry had always wanted to learn how to play guitar. He was worried that he was too old to learn something new. However, he decided to enroll in weekly guitar classes. Finally he became a reasonably good guitar player. Jerry decided to play his guitar for his friends.
I wanted a pet for my birthday. I wasn't sure what to get, I already had dogs. I was looking around on facebook and saw a mini pig. I went to pick her up. I drove home with the mini pig in my car.

Annie was the top gymnast in her class. She received many awards and competed a lot. One day after a competition she remembered overdue homework. Her teacher would not let her turn in the homework. She was very happy with the teacher.

Ana was playing basketball when her finger started hurting. An hour later, she was unable to move it. Her mother told her she was overreacting. Later that night, she was in so much pain she couldn't sleep. Her mother took her to the emergency room to have it checked.

Lauren finished her late night shift at the bar feeling tired. She usually liked taking the bus home from work. However, tonight she noticed that the moon looked beautiful. She strolled home happily under the bright moon. Lauren wishes she took the bus home.

After being injured, Tommy needed to go to the doctor. Quickly, his mother drove him downtown. There were a lot of people in the waiting room! After a while, a nurse came to see tommy. Tommy was then badly injured.

All of the Ross family has red hair, except Henry. Henry has blonde hair that is very curly. Henry's father often teases Henry's mother about the mailman. The mailman has blonde, curly hair, but he is very ugly. His dad's teasing makes Henry feel bad.
Gina went to her 6th hour class. It was gym. Gina hated gym, and all things related. She was horrified when the teacher made them run the first day. Gina felt amazing that she ran.

Steven Avery committed murder. Burned human remains were found on his property. Steven was the last person to see the female murder victim alive. He was arrested, charged, tried, and convicted of murder. The next week, Steven went to the movies with friends.

Bob was playing basketball. He dropped his glasses on the ground. He was disappointed when he saw that they were broken. Bob went to the glasses store the next day. Bob was able to wear his glasses again after getting them fixed.

Jenna needed clothes for school. She took her allowance money and met up with friends at the mall. They walked inside and looked for shops they liked. Jenna and her friends walked through the mall for hours. Jenna's friends loved shopping.

Bob loved to watch movies. He was looking forward to a three day weekend coming up. He made a list of his favorite movies and invited some friends over. He spent the weekend with his friends watching all his favorite movies Bob had a great time.

Lisa began to realize that she did not enjoy studying business. She wanted to study art but was worried about making money. Finally, one day she had the courage to drop out of school. Her friends and family told her it was crazy to leave school. Lisa still felt confident that her choice would make her happy.

There was a stray cat who loved my cat. He came by to see her everyday. I eventually took him in and let him inside, and named him Tokyo. He got very sick, out of nowhere. Both cats were very healthy.

Tammy likes to crochet. Christmas was a few weeks away and she didn't really have money. She got the idea to take the spare yarn she had to make a blanket. She then wrapped it up for her grandchild Lorelei. Tammy was sad that she didn't have a present to give.

Amy went to the grocery store after work. She had a short list of items to buy. The store was out of half the items. Amy had to go to a second grocery store. After that she was able to go home and cook a good meal.

Ken's football team was losing the game. The game was almost over and they needed seven points to win. Then Ken threw a touchdown and scored! The fans and the team cheered him loudly. Ken's team was very happy to win the game.

Mary and Sally decided to go on a vacation together. After looking at a travel website, then decided on a cruise. They went on a cruise to the Bahamas in April. Both girls had a wonderful time on the cruise. They both came back perfectly relaxed.
Samuel loved reading old science fiction stories. He collected books by HG Wells and Jules Verne. His favorite was HG Wells. His father gave him a copy of The Island of Dr Moreau. He loved it!

Steven was a soldier for the army. He reached the rank of General after 5 Years. When he was a general, he lead an army of men into a battle. None of his soldiers were killed and the battle resulted in a victory. He was the greatest general ever.

Jackie was driving to work on the expressway. There was a truck with a horse in the cage. As the truck accelerated, the cage open and the horse came out. It fell on Jackie's car window. The window was busted, but the horse survived.
Sam was walking home. It began to get dark. Sam got scared. He didn't know what to do. Sam curled into a little ball of fear right there in the street.
Don noticed a fly go into the living room. He decided to swat it. He tried for half an hour but it kept evading him. Eventually the fly flew out on its own. Don never went to the lake again.

My niece got a new bicycle for Christmas. She was afraid that she would fall of her new bicycle. I decided to help my niece learn to ride. I held the bike as she begins cycling. She soon learned to ride.
Tori stole a candy cane from her Christmas tree. Her mother had told her not to. She thought she had gotten away with it. However, her mother noticed and punished her. Tori was happy her mother knew.

All Kevin wanted in life was to buy his fiance a house. He became near obsessed, saving every penny. He worked multiple jobs and lived as a miser. After a year, Kevin had enough money for a down payment. Kevin used the money that he had saved to buy a sports car.
Sam was stargazing one night. Suddenly he sat bolt upright. He saw a twinkling, moving star! He ran to show it to his dad. His dad laughed because the star was really a jet with lights.

Ally's dog met a porcupine. The dog ended up with spines in her face. Ally had to take the dog to the vet. The vet pulled each and every spine out of the dog's face. Ally's dog was worn out for the rest of the night.
Tim had a dentist appointment today. He was going to get his wisdom teeth pulled. His dentist numbed his gums. His wisdom teeth popped out instantly. It was less hassle than he thought it would be.

Joe grew a big batch of peas in his garden. He brought the peas inside and shelled them all. Then he cooked them up in a big pot. He added ham, bacon, and carrots to make thick pea soup. Joe dumped the pot outside because he hated soup.

Abigail's cat jumped out of her arms and ran down the road. The skittish cat saw a dog and ran up a tree. The cat was stuck and could not get down. Abigail called the fire department, and they came right away. Abigail was disappointed to get her kitty out of the tree.
I have a favorite pair of socks. Last week I was doing laundry. One of the two was lost. I looked everywhere and couldn't find it. All my socks were accounted for.

The family was lounging on a street bench when a dog walked up. It was dirty,scared and painfully thin. The family saw it had no collar. The dog was obviously in need of a home. The family opted to take the dog home with them.

Micky wanted a job. He began to look in the classifieds in the local paper. He went on several interviews. Micky was finally called by one of the companies he applied at. Micky made reservations at a motel.

Nancy was sitting near the science building. Ian tried to sneak close to her. She didn't notice until she looked around. Ian threw a pie directly in her face. Nancy caught the pie and began to eat it.

Jackson was going on a trip. He was going camping in Utah. He drove out to a campground and set up a tent. He spent the trip relaxing and enjoying the outdoors. After the trip, Jackson felt rejuvenated.

Remy liked to drink milk. But one day, she spilled milk all over her carpet. And she didn't think bother to clean the spill properly. The next morning, she woke up to a terrible smell. Remy felt it was a good idea to spill more milk on the carpet.
Larry bought new shoes last week. He wore them for the first time to school. Unfortunately they weren't broken in and really hurt. He was in pain all day. He took his shoes off as soon as he could.

Bill and Teddy were at the bar together. Bill noticed a pretty girl. He went up to her to flirt but she didn't like him. He was too drunk to talk properly. Bill carefully added up the column of eight digit numbers.
Steve was very sad. Steve's girlfriend broke up with him. He decided to write a song to her. He poured his heart into the song. Steve drove an hour away to go to a strip joint for drugs.
Joe woke up on a cold morning. He tried to find a good pair of pants to wear. All of his pants were too dirty to wear. He had to put on shorts and go about his day. He was sweaty all day.

Joe and his friends were throwing rock at windows. The windows were part of an abandoned building. The police caught joe and his friends. Joe felt sorry for his poor judgement. Joe never threw rocks again.

Selena was a music artist with a lot of fans. One of them was too obsessed. He kept following her places in public and sending her creepy messages. She decided to go to the authorities. Selena made sure the person was arrested.

Ally and Jill went for a walk. It was cold outside and it started to snow. They were far away from their house and started to get very cold. They decided to knock on a stranger's door for some help. The stranger offered them hot chocolate.

Jose is an immigrant. He and his family came here from Mexico. Jose wants to take a trip to visit his other family members Mexico. He plans diligently and purchases the necessary travel items. Jose vows never to go to Mexico again.

Amelia took her little sister to the park. She told her sister to play, and took out her iphone. When she looked up, she realized her sister was gone! She raced through the park, screaming her sister's name. She found her sister nearby.

Janel was driving to the office when she heard a loud bang. Suddenly the car began to vibrate very heavily. Janel put on her hazard lights and pulled over. Upon inspection, she found she had a flat tire. Jane changed her tire and drove to the office.

My brother had a lot of candy after Halloween. However, he didn't like candy. So, he decided to give his candy away. He gave his candy to his neighbors, who had a lot of children. The family and children were grateful to my brother.
Rose took a train to Long Island. There, she went to the very tip of the island. She went to the beach at Montauk Point. It was cold and windswept. Rose shielded her face from the wind.

Brie and her cat moved in with her boyfriend and his cat. The two cats hated each other. They spent most of their hissing each other. One night, six months later, the cats decided to cuddle. Brie hated cheese.

The first time I went on a boat was with a family vacation. We were all excited because it was my first time. Unfortunately I fell over the side railing and almost drowned. My cousin jumped in to save me and dragged me out. I've been afraid of the water ever since.

A beautiful bunch of bananas dangled just out of reach. Bobby tried throwing his shoe, but it got stuck. He tried climbing the tree, but he fell. Next, he whacked furiously with a hoe, but it was too short to reach. Bobby was upset that he got the bananas.

Amy is enrolled in an advanced Plant Biology course. She has a test next week about Photosynthesis. The information is complex and in depth. She wrote a song about it to memorize the material more easily. Her song helped her and she then did well.

Gina didn't want to sit at her desk near her old friends. She could feel the tension between them. She decided to ask to go to the library. Her teacher agreed to allow her to go for an hour. Gina felt more calm once she arrived in the library.
One day, my computer mouse stopped working. I went to the store to buy a new one. Every mouse I found was too expensive. I went home and decided to try and fix my mouse. I was successful.

I wanted to take a shower after work. I got my clothes and towel from the closet. I went into the bathroom and turned on the shower. I got undressed. Then I walked over to my neighbor's house to borrow some soap.

Tory was tired of the hot weather. And he had no air conditioner at home. He gathered what money he could and set out to buy one. But as he stepped outside, he noticed rain drops. It became too hot and dry for Tory to go out.

Naomi and Andy were riding their bikes in downtown SF. Naomi heard a loud crash and turned around to look at Andy. Andy had swerved away from an oncoming vehicle and into a trolley. On impact Andy was flung over his handlebars and landed on his wrist. Andy's wrist was broken.

Josh played basketball every day. His goal was to be able to make any basket on the court. One day, someone challenged him to a contest. Whoever makes the most shots would be the winner! He made the most shots and won the contest.

Madeline was thrilled to get a new purse at Saks. Her mother took her to the bag department. Madeline immediately saw a pink bag she loved. She could not believe how amazing it was. Madeline's mother happily bought the bag for her.

Abe really enjoyed numbers and statistics. He was curious how many guns the population of Stanford owned. He sent out a survey. Abe spent weeks tallying the results. The results were inconclusive and Abe didn't care.

David and Mia rarely got to go out since they had young children. One Friday, they were finally able to get away to see a movie. They were looking forward to it so much, but it turned out to be bad! In fact, it was so bad that they could barely contain their giggles. David and Mia thought the movie was profound.

Our 19 month old granddaughter loves her uncle Joe. It was Joe's birthday yesterday. Our granddaughter lives 200 miles away from her uncle. Her daddy had make a video wishing her uncle Happy Birthday. She did not want to wish her uncle happy birthday n.
Jeffries's remote ran out of batteries. It stopped working completely. He needed to replace them. So he went to the store to buy some more. He made sure to buy rechargeable batteries this time.

Amy came home from school on her birthday to an empty house. She was upset that everyone had forgotten her special day. She walked sadly into the living room. Suddenly, her friends and family jumped out from their hiding spots. Amy walked out of the room and left the house.
Anna went to the salon. She was getting her nails done for the first time. She was nervous, but the tech was friendly. He did her nails quickly and expertly. Anna really liked her new hairstyle.
Whit has a dog. It sleeps all the time. It doesn't just sleep like a normal dog. It snores like a human. Whit doesn't sleep well.

Tom always wanted to see a moose. Tom decided to go to Maine where many moose live. Tom saw a moose while driving on a back road. Tom tried to take a picture of the moose and fell out of the car. Tom went to pick wildflowers by the side of the road.

I was walking to the store recently. As I was passing an exit, I felt cold, hard steel on my arm. I was shocked that I was being hit by a car! The driver was very apologetic after he saw I was hit. The driver of the car became very angry at me.

I found a snake in the basement window well. I tried to hit it with a spade, but it dug down where I couldn't see. I thought it had gone under the siding near the foundation. I went down in the basement and found it behind the wall. I was able to catch the snake and get it out of my house.
I love taking long warm showers. They feel great and they're fun. Unfortunately they're wasteful. So I always feel bad when I take one. That's why I take two of them every day.

Rebecca met Jake when they were both six Year's old. They became best friends and grew up together. When they were 13 Year's old, Jakels family moved away. He promised Rebecca he would come back for her. Jake's family moved back next to Rebecca three years later.

I wanted a pet for my birthday. I wasn't sure what to get, I already had dogs. I was looking around on facebook and saw a mini pig. I went to pick her up. I brought a dog home since I have so many dogs already.

Javier thought that motorcycles seemed very cool. His parents warned him that motorcycles were very dangerous. Still, he bought a motorcycle and began taking lessons. Now he drives his motorcycle to work every day. He sold his bike for a car.

Ben lost his job. He was devastated since he loved his job. Months went by and he could not find a job in his field. So, he started to worry that he would never find a job. But then he did find a job.

Patty was excited about having her friends over. She had been working hard preparing the food. She also had the place looking spotless. All of her friends arrived and were seated at the table. Patty decided to take everyone out to a restaurant.

Anna was walking to school one morning. She entered the crosswalk on the main road. A car suddenly flew into it and struck her. Anna was crushed and her leg was broken. Anna sued them but got nothing because they had no insurance.

Jane purchase a backpack online for her teenage nephew. She was pleased to see how excited he was when she gave it to him. He hurriedly ripped the plastic wrap off the backpack. When he tried it on it was too small. Jane was disappointed.

Rebecca always works very late to get all of her work done. She hopes that the company president notices her hard work. Finally it is announced that Rebecca will be promoted. She cries happy tears knowing that her work is recognized. She called her parents right away to share the good news.

Ann woke up in the middle of the night. She was thirsty and wanted a drink of water. She tiptoed into the kitchen and got a drink. But then she accidentally dropped the glass, which shattered! Ann decided to start dancing.
Dana couldn't find her car keys this morning. She looked everywhere. She examined each room carefully. She finally signaled a sigh of relief. Dana walked to work instead.
Bob needed money. He decided to look for a part time job. He applied to five different places. One of them gave Bob an interview. Bob excelled in the interview and got the job.
Tammy went for lunch at a cafe. There, she bought french fries and a soda. She ate them both happily. She paid a reasonable price for her meal. Tammy wrote a poor review of the cafe on yelp.

Sandra had always wished for a pet turtle. She told her parents she would be responsible for it. At first her parents didn't agree. Eventually Sandra convinced her parents she should get a turtle. She loved her new turtle.
John planted a garden last spring. He tilled the soil. The tomato plants began to produce. But crows devoured John's harvest. John decided to try again and work passed the crows.

Carlos has always wanted to visit France. He decides that he should learn to speak French before he goes. He enrolls in a night class and studies very hard. Finally Carlos can speak French pretty well. Carlos books a flight to Australia.
Sue was a very fit woman. She worked out on a daily basis. Sue found out she was expecting a baby. She continued to workout during the pregnancy. Sue continued to drink alcohol.

Ted went for a drive one day. He drove all around town and looked at who was out and about. Then, he drove to a more remote place. He stopped, got out of his car, and ate a picnic lunch. He hated picnics.

Ellen was at her doctor's office. She was about to find out the sex of her baby. She was really hoping for a boy! She held her breath as the doctor scanned her belly. Ellen was disappointed to find out she was having a boy.

My roommate interviewed for a new job. He practiced every night the week before to make sure he was ready. When the day came, he dressed up in his nicest clothes. We waited in anticipation to hear what would happen. He got a call a few days later saying that he got the job.
Jane and Shawn were close friends. They did everything together. They got married when they were older. Jane died of cancer. Shawn missed Jane every day.
My mother threw out her old dictionary. I retrieved it from the trash. Sitting with it, I found myself smelling it. It reminded me of the scent of an old library. It smelled so good that I ate it.
Joe had an accountant. He never paid attention to his accountant. Until one day he realized he had no money. Joe furiously stormed into the accountant's office. Joe went for a run on the beach.

Jessica and her brothers were very excited for Christmas. They went to sleep early so they could wake up early. They woke up and ran to the Christmas tree. There was only one box under the tree. Each of her brothers opened their Christmas presents.
Sam drove around with his high beams on. One of his headlights was out and he thought it was safer. He was pulled over last night. The cop gave him a ticket and told him to fix it. Sam was unhappy.
There was a man from kentucky. He loved a girl who lived in Louisiana. He decided he needed to move. He moved to be with his love. The man moved to Kentucky.

A group of religious pilgrims took a trip to a shrine. The journey was long and arduous. On arriving, they found a gift shop there. This struck them as highly inappropriate. The pilgrims bought many souvenirs there.

Ken was on vacation in the tropics. He was learning to scuba dive. He passed his certification course and then dived every day. Soon he was learning lots of facts about the ocean and exploring. It was the best vacation Ken had ever taken.

A girl falls in love with a boy and he liked her too. She finds out that their parents don't get along. The boy and the girl love each other so much. But, they don't want to hurt their parents feelings so they stay away But eventually they get together anyway.

There was a home of poor dogs wandering the streets of Alaska. They had trouble finding people to feed them. Eventually they ran into a rich, old man who took them in. He fed them and gave them a great home. The old man threw rock at the dogs until they left his property.
Lots of people were walking to class. They all wanted to get there fast. People started pushing others out of the way. They fell down. The crowd made many people late to class.

My friend had a bachelor party before her wedding. A group of us got together and went out on the town. We had dinner and drinks at a Mexican restaurant. We then got in a limo and went bar hopping. We had an uneventful night.

Sandy recently lost her job. As a consequence, Sandy could not pay her mortgage. After several months, Sandy's got some bad news. Sandy was told her house was being foreclosed on. Sandy bought three new homes.

Lenny wanted to watch a movie. He drove to the local Hollywood video. Lenny rented three horror movies. Lenny went next door and bought a pizza from a shop. He went back home and binge watched all of his movies.
Linda always wanted to learn to ice skate. She asked her mom to sign her up for lesson. She fell over and over again. She kept practicing every day. Linda was determined.
Lou was on a diet. She was eating very little. But she still struggled to lose weight! Then she added an exercise regimen. Lou decided she had lost enough weight.

Keira found a man she thought was a keeper. He had a great job, impressive house, and paid for all their dates. A few months into dating, Keira started planning her wedding dress. And then he hit her because she burned dinner. Keira cannot stay with this abusive man.

A girl falls in love with a boy and he liked her too. She finds out that their parents don't get along. The boy and the girl love each other so much. But, they don't want to hurt their parents feelings so they stay away The boy and girl's parents are very happy they love each other.

Ava had a lot of old clothes. She never wore them, but she didn't want to throw them away. Her mom suggested that Ava donate them. Ava took them to the thrift store and donated them there. Ava felt very good about what she had done.

Hank began to clean out his closet. He made a pile of wire hangers that he didn't need. Hank thought that he should recycle all the extra wires. He took them to the junkyard and sold them for scrap. Hank got a few dollars.

Bob's stomach was really bothering him after the big meal. A friend he had dined with called to say she was feeling ill, too. They decided the seafood they'd eaten had been bad. Sometime later, Bob finally threw up the contents of his stomach. Bob will be careful that he never eats at that restaurant again.
Anna was craving candy. She had none in her house! She was desperate for junk food. She went next door and asked her neighbor. Anna does not have neighbors.

Barry had only one thousand dollars left in his bank account. He needed to find a job. He searched for 3 months. Eventually, his money ran out. Somehow, thousands of dollars appeared in his bank account.

Rose wanted to go to the award ceremony. She didn't have anything appropriate to wear to such an occasion. She called a friend and asked if she could borrow her nicest dress. The friend invited her over and Rose looked through her wardrobe. Rose was very upset with her friend.

Today was my 21st birthday. Since I'm able to drink, my friend took me to a bar. She order her favorite drink, specifically for me. After taking a sip of the drink, I was disgusted. I found the drink to be bitter-tasting.
I had to write an analysis paper for English. I read the source material over and over. I thought about it very hard. Then, I wrote my analysis paper. I decided to delete the finished paper.

Ray and his friends planned to go to the beach. So Ray worked out to build up his muscles. When Ray and his friends went to the beach, they noticed Ray's body. Ray was happy to be the center of attention. All his friends were jealous of his new physique.

Jill's health class was visiting an acupuncture clinic. Their teacher told them that although it was alternative, it worked. During the visit, Jill got a horrible migraine. The acupuncturist offered to treat her. Jill's headache went away.

Bob got a rubix cube for Christmas. He struggled to solve the puzzle. Eventually, he was able to solve half of it. But, the full solution remained elusive. Bob worked hard and then finally solved the puzzle.
Anna wanted to bake a cake for her mom's birthday. She tried twice, but both cakes fell flat. Then she found a solution. She went to the bakery and bought a cake. Her mother enjoyed the cake greatly.

The church choir went around town singing Christmas carols. While singing in the park, they encountered a homeless man. The homeless man seemed very annoyed with their singing. Once he heard O Holy Night, he sang along with the choir. He started to enjoy himself.

Trouble comes when folks do not listen. My daughter did not listen to me today. She was dancing too close to the wall. She lost control and hit the corner of the wall. My daughter learned her lesson the hard way.
I was tired of working at Walmart. The hours were bad. The store music was awful. I handed my two weeks in to the manager. I then found another job and was happy.

Pat wore his favorite shirt to work. During a break he noticed a thread hanging from his collar. He followed the thread to a rip in the fabric. Pat went to a store to buy a sewing kit. He sewed up the rip before it got any bigger.
Yesterday I was carrying a new glass into the kitchen. To my surprise I dropped it. The glass shattered. I had to pick it up. I loved the way the glass looked now.

Throughout my day in school, I was completely tired. As my Spanish teacher taught accents, I was falling asleep. During lunch, I decided to rest on the bleachers in the football field. In addition, I fell asleep on the bus ride home. I had an early night.

Larry has decided to help out his friends prepare for a party. He needs to bring a salad to the party. Larry slices tomato, lettuce, and other vegetables for the salad. When it is finished, he feels great. Larry was happy that he could contribute to the party.
I was captain of the tennis team. We were playing our division rivals. I was tied with my opponent. I had advantage of the deuce. I won the match.

It���s very quiet at night with no nurses running around the hospital. Only the constantly humming machine beside my bed comforts me. The machine has become my life. Life has become very simple now with an uncomplicated goal. I can't wait to go on vacation tomorrow.

It was summer and Gina and her sister were bored. They decided to watch music videos. There was the music video channel or the black entertainment channel. They chose to watch the black entertainment channel. Gina disliked spending time with her sister.

Sal hurt his leg when his wife accidentally tripped him. She felt so bad that she waited on him hand and foot. She bought him food and gave him messages. Sal liked all the attention. Sal was furious with his wife.

We went to Frank Pepe's pizza shop three weeks ago. The chain is quite famous in Connecticut. The chain recently opened in Boston. We went early to beat the crowd. We walked 5 growling dogs at the park across town.
Jeb was building statues out of rocks. He made one that looked like a turtle. Sam came and knocked it down. Jeb started crying. Jeb was excited to build a new one.

Ken needed extra money so he got a part time job. His job was washing dishes at a local Wendy's. One day his friend called and invited him to a party. The party was at the same time as his work shift. He got a hole in one in golf.

Last week I had to give a big speech. I never prepared and only new the very basics. I figured i would just go in and fake it. I used big words and tried to sound smart. I stopped talking and went home.

Mark has spent Years without a girlfriend. He tried meeting someone to date without any success. Finally a friend introduces him to Carol, and they arrange a date. Mark and Carol have a nice night out at a restaurant. Mark and Carol arrange a second date.

Yesterday, Pat was on a hiking trip with her girl scout troop. While they were eating lunch, her friends were playing around. One of the girls grabbed her phone and threw it into the lake. The girl was reprimanded for her action, but Pat never found her phone. Pat never talked to that girl again.

Jane met Greg in an internet chat room. They agreed to meet at starbucks for coffee. They hit it off surprisingly well. They agreed to meet again the next day. Jane thought Greg wouldn't make a good friend.
His eyes burned with pain. His stomach churned and twisted. His lungs were filled with fluid. Painful coughs rattled the halls of his small home. He got up and decided to go for a jog.

I walked inside of the dentists office. After signing the attendance board, the dentist greeted me. He showed me where to sit. Afterwards, he started to operate on my teeth. I was nervous but he reassured me that everything was fine.

Robert's dog passed away last month and he's still upset. His wife wants to distract Robert with something. She suggests they go shopping for a new dog. Robert tags along and discovers that he loves looking at puppies! Robert decided he wanted a pet cat.

Logan and Maria decided to make a film together. They wrote the script and hired the actors. After a lot of work, finally the film was done. They invited everyone to come see it. Logan and Maria were ashamed of the film.

Paul was embarrassed by his bad skin. He had been troubled by acne for a long time. He realized it was causing him to be antisocial. He made an appointment with a dermatologist. Paul changed schools instead.

Ron has anger problems. During a trip to the store, he got angry at a slow cashier. The cashier was sassy, and egged him on further. Ron grabbed the cashier by the shirt, and pulled him over the counter. Ron was arrested.

Missy bought a ticket to the carnival. She went in and looked around, open mouthed. She loved all the games and rides! She spent the whole day having a great time. Missy decided to go back to the carnival the next day.

Last Tuesday I took my first spin class at the gym. It was the hardest exercise class I ever took. I worked through it for an hour and my legs went numb. When I got home my legs started to hurt and I couldn't walk. I went to bed and then rested until morning.
Sean wanted to go out for a picnic. He packed himself a lunch in a basket. Then, he rode his bike off to a field. In the field, he ate his picnic. Sean hated dining al fresco.

Dan and three friends wanted to start an exterminator business. They got a small loan and bought some cheap office space. They had to make a lot of their own equipment. They became very specialized, and so kept a regular clientele. The next day they closed the business.
Jack loved to jump around. He was just a little kid that loved to jump. One day he jumped one too many times. And landed on a lego piece. Jack decided to jump again because it felt great.
I met my husband to be at Costco. He drew horns on my membership picture and flirted wildly. I don't know why I said yes to a date, but I did. Five Years later, we married. I don't love him.

Joss's family was hosting an exchange student. Joss was afraid she and the new girl would not get along. But when the girl arrived, they liked each other! They soon were shopping and chatting together all the time. Joss told her mom that the exchange student was mean.

Sean was going for a job interview. He arrived at the business and asked for the manager. The manager took him to the back and interviewed him. Then, the manager showed him around and explained the job. The manager wanted Sean to understand everything.

Howard was feeling happy one morning. He decided to spend all day enjoying his life. All day, while at work, he complimented his coworkers. When he got home, he took his family to see a movie and have dinner. Howard was happy to have had such a good day.

Cal got an ice cream making machine for his birthday. He was so excited to try it out! He added all the ingredients. Then he turned the crank and watched eagerly. A big bowl of chocolate ice cream was soon ready.

He watched in anger from outside the window. The lovers were oblivious to his presence. He burst through the door and was atop them in moments. The other man struggled but he was too weak to prevent his own demise. His cheating wife continued the affair.

Sara learned that she was expecting a child. She made it through the nine months of pregnancy. One day her water broke and she was taken to the hospital. Sara was in labor for 4 hours. Sara took a nap.

Stewart and his sister were fighting over the TV remote. Their parents yelled at them to stop, but the kids persisted. During a tug of war over the remote, it flew out of their hands. The remote smashed into the TV screen, resulting in a big crack. Stewart and his sister parents congratulated them.

They had to pick out a stove for their new house. They couldn't decide on a particular brand. They liked the durability of the Viking. They also liked the deal with the Thermador. They didn't need a stove anymore.
Ray was cooking pork chops. When he was done he shouted to the family. No one ate the pork chops. Ray was sad. Ray threw his pork chops in the trash can.

Ty was nervous about attending summer camp not knowing anyone. The first day, he met Sam playing soccer. That night, he met Brenda at the campfire. At breakfast the next morning, he met Bill. They all hung out without him and he felt excluded.

Neil was visiting Romania. He had just arrived and was excited to see Transylvania. When he got there, he saw gorgeous old castles. He also found friendly locals. Neil decided to never return to Transylvania.
Julian planted some carrot seeds in his mother's garden. But they did not grow! He watered them some more. He waited another week. Potato plants began to sprout.
Last year my uncle bought a metal detector. He takes it to the beach every weekend. A few months ago he found a Rolex. It was worth a few hundred dollars. My uncle enjoys his hobby.

We were supposed to celebrate Valentine's Day. But then my niece came down with a bad cold. So we stayed in and played games. We rotated between Heads Up and Monopoly. We played Monopoly for two hours.

Bob was driving from Texas to Florida. He refused to stop at hotels for a break. After fifteen hours of driving, he was tired. He began to fall asleep. Bob decided to stay at a nearby hotel for the night.
Mable loved animals. One day Mabel went for a walk. Mable saw a baby coon. She took it home with her. Mable didn't want to have a pet coon.

I hired a social media manager. I thought they would drive more traffic to my website. They spent most of their time reading other people's posts. My traffic actually went down in the following month. I decided to fire my new social media manager.
My family went out to dinner on Thursday. We chose a local pizza place. The food was delicious. The staff was friendly and quick. We'll be going back there often.

Kathie does not like babies. One day, she became pregnant. She was concerned she might not like her baby. When the baby was born, she fell in love with the baby. Kathie decided she'd be okay with having another one.

I play the lottery a lot and I always lose. This year alone I've played over one hundred times. I did the math to see how much money I would have if I never played. Turns out I would have thousands more in my pocket. I no longer play the lottery.

Ellen's family went to the mountains to cut down a fresh tree. They searched and searched before finding the perfect Christmas tree. Just as her dad was about to make the first cut, they noticed a nest. There was a family of squirrels living in the tree. Ellen watched her dad chop the tree for firewood.
Mark and Andy worked at a pizzeria. They both loved to make pizza. One day they decided to open up their own pizzeria. The pizzeria became very busy and profitable. Their business became a success.

When it was time to eat, Mother rang the bell. Dad and Bill knew that sound when they heard it. They dropped their yard work, carefully, and washed their hands. Mother was happy when they finally arrived in the house. She then yelled for them to get back to work.
I had to write an analysis paper for English. I read the source material over and over. I thought about it very hard. Then, I wrote my analysis paper. I put a lot of effort into the paper.

Connie was invited to a party. When she arrived at the party, there was weird music playing. She looked around, and everyone was dancing weirdly. She was so freaked out, she turned around and left. She decided to give it a chance, and returned to the party.
Carly was waiting for Sam to call her. He promised to on Friday. It was now late Saturday and she hadn't heard anything. Finally she decided to call him. Carly ordered take-out over the phone.
Neil had just arrived in Morocco. He loved the exotic feel of it. The language was beautiful. And the people were so friendly, too! Neil wished he could stay.

Sarah decided to participate in a karaoke contest at her local bar. She wanted to win the prize money but also wanted the accolades. The night of the contest she was nervous and got pretty drunk. Luckily she was an even better singer when she was inebriated. She won first prize that day.

Bill was not the most confident driver. It was time for him to take his road test for his license. He had a little trouble backing out of the parking space. After that it went great. Bill received his license that day.
Priya decided to try a new restaurant. She drove to a new cafe that opened. Priya sat at a booth. She ordered a mimosa and a breakfast burrito. Priya decided not to eat and left.

Ronnie was riding his bike to work the other day. All of a sudden he hit a rock and fell. He wasn't hurt but his outfit was ruined. He kept going to work anyway. Ronnie's boss commended him on his dedication.
Marle was a doctor. She performed surgery on Mister Pink. She took out Mister Pink's appendix and stitched him up. But Mister Pink was there for a vasectomy. Mister Pink thanked Marie for her help.

Andrew had never been in trouble for anything. His parents were out of town for the week. Andrew's friends came over and wanted to drink. So Andrew took out his parents secret stash of alcohol. Andrew wished his parents had alcohol.

Jim complained that his wife never did the dishes. She then complained that Jim never cooked dinner. The next day they decided to switch their roles. The meal was horrible and dishes didn't get cleaned well enough. They both decided to go back to their previous roles.

John and Billy became very skilled at beer pong. They entered a contest in college. They won the contest and advanced to the next level. The next level sent them to Vegas. In Vegas, John and Billy competed against eighty contestants.
Alice was pregnant. She went to the doctor's. They scanned her stomach with the ultrasound. Then they told her the sex of her baby. She decided on the name "Pat" for her new baby.

Sarah had never been on a boat before. Today her mom took her to the pier for her very first boat ride. Sarah was very excited. She stepped on the boat and heard the engine roar. It was such a long car trip.

Kay loved Ice Cream. She visited Cold Stone and discovered they had cinnamon ice cream. She ate cinnamon ice cream every week for 3 months. One day she returned and was told the ice cream was no longer sold. Kay was crushed!
Vince was craving something sweet. Vince did not want his usual dessert of ice cream. Vince drove his car to Yogurtland. Vince got 10 ounces of frozen yogurt. He shared it with a cute girl he met.

Tina is very tired every single morning. She does not get enough sleep because of her two jobs. Tina decides to quit one of the jobs. She now gets enough sleep to function everyday. Tina is more tired than ever before.

Jim was teaching his son to ride a bike. At first he taught the boy with training wheels. Then he removed the wheels. Jim was so happy he almost cried to see his son peddling. Jim re-attached the training wheels.

Megan has been struggling with a drug habit for years. She hit rock bottom when she lost her family and kids. Her distant family decided to stage an intervention. After the event, she got into a rehab facility. When she arrived, she did drugs all day.
I love making Popsicles. I get a lot of juice and pour it in the molds. When I take them out of the freezer they are so good. The taste is so rich. The popsicles are great.
